meta.name: description
meta.content: Navarro ISD is a Texas Public School located in the community of Geronimo, TX near Seguin, San Marcos and New Braunfels, Texas.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Navarro ISD, Public School, K-12 Schools, Geronimo TX, Seguin TX, New Braunfels TX, San Marcos TX,

li.a: Military Families-Joint Base San Antonio School Liaison Office

div.p:
Governor Abbott announced on Friday, April 17, that all of the public and
private schools, colleges and universities in the State of Texas are to remain
closed for the remainder of the school year.

img.alt: Navarro ISD Closed Through May 28th Featured Photo

div.div: Governor Abbott announced on Friday, April 17, that all of the public and private schools, colleges and universities in the State of Texas are to remain closed for the remainder of the school year.

img.alt: Navarro ISD selects finalist for Superintendent of Schools Featured Photo

h3.a: Navarro ISD selects finalist for Superintendent of Schools

div.div: On Tuesday, April 14, 2020 the Navarro ISD Board of Trustees selected and named Ms. Wendi Russell as the Finalist for the position of Superintendent of Schools.

img.alt: Guadelupe County Issues Stay at Home Order Featured Photo

h3.a: Guadelupe County Issues Stay at Home Order

div.div: Due to the school closures, the Navarro ISD Child Nutrition Department announces that we will offer free curbside meals through May 29th at the Navarro Intermediate Cafeteria. Meals will be distributed on the west side of the cafeteria.
